title: How can a person not be afraid of existence itself? - Quora

response.answer_text: You know you’re thinking too much when you start to be afraid of existing at all. Try concentrating on feeling for a change, feeling life inside you and in nature around you. Learn to meditate on it. The answer to the question you’re asking reveals itself to you on a spiritual level and through the practical experience of living — a balanced harmony of body and mind is required to understand living. Go too far into the realm of the mind, you will lose track of your body and fall into spiritual separation from the natural processes in and around you — which in turn results in imbalanced thinking, and brings you no closer to understanding life itself. That courage, the drive to live, exists in one’s spirit (body+mind) — as well as our sense of balance.
